data.lyric:
[ti:Partin Ways (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame 2.0 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Partin Ways (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:10.09]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:20.19]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:30.29]On the grind can't indulge in the foolish stuff
[00:32.24]On the grind can't indulge in the foolish stuff
[00:34.22]Young n***a always held his own
[00:36.12]Feel like I'm way overdue for prop
[00:37.93]Fed up hell yeah I been through a lot
[00:39.70]Keep it on me come see if that's true or not
[00:41.76]Dropped the rakes two Gs and a 4L
[00:44.15]That's how me and all my troopers rock
[00:45.58]Play with us f**k around get your shooters shot
[00:47.47]It's gon' be a sad day when that Ruger knock
[00:49.63]We ain't done yet we gon' spin the block
[00:51.40]Face shot Spot News what we do to opps
[00:53.65]Know them n***as want me gone but I can't go
[00:55.87]I'ma shoot my gun back
[00:57.45]Only got yourself and some hope
[00:58.84]And if I go who gon' teach my son that
[01:01.32]Breakup tryna blamе my faults and time goes on
[01:03.56]But we always run back
[01:05.18]Tryna find ways just to copе
[01:06.49]I been there before know we all been done bad
[01:09.14]Colorblind dollar signs swear that's all that I think about
[01:12.96]Internal wounds on my conscience lose my mind start bleedin' out
[01:16.87]He relate to my problems so his trauma got him singin' loud
[01:20.76]Mixed emotions can't stop it and my temper can't keep it down
[01:24.69]If you run out of options girl you know what keys to dial
[01:28.50]Don't care if this toxic want your love and I need it now
[01:31.78]Uh
[01:32.08]One day we was lovers and friends
[01:33.61]But everything gotta come to an end
[01:35.96]Heartbreak got you runnin' again
[01:37.46]I just want somethin' real I don't wanna pretend
[01:39.46]Really felt connections from the touch of your skin
[01:41.50]Constantly drinkin' I'm stuck in a binge
[01:43.62]Are you careless or was it revenge
[01:45.54]Crazy what the true colors can blend uh
[01:47.47]Think about me all day what you probably do
[01:49.42]Now you tryna get used to somebody new
[01:51.23]I could've wrestled some s**t just to copy you
[01:53.30]I just put all my feelings inside the stu'
[01:55.19]I was lookin' for you to lean on
[01:56.51]But my son and the music that's really what got me through
[01:59.03]Have you ever let the wrong one steal your heart
[02:01.20]I been a victim of rappin' too uh
[02:02.99]We partin' ways and I'm fine with that
[02:04.38]'Cause the same old s**t ain't got time for that
[02:06.65]Common sense that's what your mind would lack
[02:08.39]Yeah you tried to play can't rewind it back uh
[02:10.53]Grindin' for the fam I was up all night
[02:12.23]Likes on the 'Gram got you caught up in the hype
[02:14.44]Time that we spent either f**k or a fight
[02:16.03]Then our hearts got cold 'cause the love wasn't right uh
[02:18.51]One day we was lovers and friends
[02:20.11]But everything gotta come to an end
[02:22.42]Heartbreak got you runnin' again
[02:23.78]I just want somethin' real I don't wanna pretend
[02:25.84]Really felt connections from the touch of your skin
[02:27.88]Constantly drinkin' I'm stuck in a binge
[02:30.05]Are you careless or was it revenge
[02:31.96]Crazy what the true colors can blend uh
data.trans:
[ti:Partin Ways (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame 2.0 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.09]//
[00:20.19]//
[00:30.29]努力工作 不能沉迷于这种愚蠢的事情
[00:32.24]努力工作 不能沉迷于这种愚蠢的事情
[00:34.22]年轻人总是固执己见
[00:36.12]我感觉我早该被人尊敬
[00:37.93]忍无可忍 我经历过了太多
[00:39.70]总有不幸找上我 来看看这是不是真的
[00:41.76]扔下武器 腰缠万贯 一生富贵
[00:44.15]我和我那些兄弟就是这样为所欲为
[00:45.58]来玩弄我们 四处惹事 你的枪手们都会死于枪下
[00:47.47]等到我扣动扳机 那将会是个悲伤的日子 
[00:49.63]我们还没有完成任务 我们要称霸这个街区
[00:51.40]对着脸射击 我们和仇敌的战斗登上了焦点新闻
[00:53.65]我知道那些家伙盼着我离开 但是我不能走
[00:55.87]我要开枪还击
[00:57.45]你只有你自己 还有心里那点希望
[00:58.84]如果我走了 谁来教我儿子这个道理
[01:01.32]分道扬镳 试图把错都怪到我的头上 时间流逝而过
[01:03.56]但我们总是在重蹈覆辙
[01:05.18]试着找到办法解决
[01:06.49]这些我都经历过 我知道我们做了很多坏事
[01:09.14]无视人种 得到财富 我发誓我满脑子想的都是这些
[01:12.96]我的良知受到了伤害 失去了理智 开始以命相搏
[01:16.87]因为他我才遭遇了这些麻烦 所以我让他伤痕累累 惊声尖叫
[01:20.76]复杂的心情 无法冷静 我的暴躁脾气 我没办法改掉
[01:24.69]如果你走投无路 女孩 你知道要跟谁联系
[01:28.50]不要在乎这是否会害了你 我想要你的爱 我现在就要
[01:31.78]//
[01:32.08]曾经 我们是恋人是朋友
[01:33.61]但万事万物都有结束的时候
[01:35.96]心碎的感觉让你再次奔跑
[01:37.46]我只想要真实的东西 我不想装模作样
[01:39.46]触碰到你的皮肤 真的感觉跟你心心相印
[01:41.50]一杯接一杯地喝酒 我痴迷于这样的放纵
[01:43.62]你是真的不在乎 还是想要报复我
[01:45.54]没想到虚伪的家伙能把自己伪装得那么真实
[01:47.47]整天都在想我 你可能会做什么
[01:49.42]现在你试着适应新人的陪伴
[01:51.23]为了效仿你的行为 我可以去做一些令我厌恶的事情
[01:53.30]我把所有的感情都注入了我的音乐里
[01:55.19]我曾经来找你寻求依靠
[01:56.51]但真正让我熬过去的 是我的儿子和音乐
[01:59.03]你可曾让错误的人偷走你的心
[02:01.20]我也是说唱音乐的受害者
[02:02.99]我们分道扬镳 我现在过得很好
[02:04.38]因为那种陈芝麻烂谷子的事情 我没时间再纠结了
[02:06.65]常识 你脑子里缺少的就是这东西
[02:08.39]你想要玩玩 没想到造成了无法挽回的后果
[02:10.53]为了家人辛勤工作 我彻夜不眠
[02:12.23]Instagram上的点赞 让你陷入了绯闻
[02:14.44]我们在一起的那些日子 要么是缠绵要么是争吵
[02:16.03]然后我们的心变得冰凉 因为我们不该相爱
[02:18.51]曾经 我们是恋人是朋友
[02:20.11]但万事万物都有结束的时候
[02:22.42]心碎的感觉让你再次奔跑
[02:23.78]我只想要真实的东西 我不想装模作样
[02:25.84]触碰到你的皮肤 真的感觉跟你心心相印
[02:27.88]一杯接一杯地喝酒 我痴迷于这样的放纵
[02:30.05]你是真的不在乎 还是想要报复我
[02:31.96]没想到虚伪的家伙能把自己伪装得那么真实
